To: abuse@ev1servers.net

X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net 
X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00

TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED

X-OriginalArrivalTime: 14 Feb 2007 23:27:33.0353 (UTC)
FILETIME=[B3FBFD90:01C7508F] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
I am writing to inform you that one of your customers is in violation  
of my copyrights by distributing images owned by my company via their  
public forum. 
         
As per the proper DMCA notice, I have provided the following below. 
 
My name is Chase Brown, and I am authorized to act on behalf on my  
company, CB Entertainment LLC.  My company is located at 12483 Margaret

Dr., Fenton, MI 48430, USA.  My telephone number is (866) 816-5091, and

my email address is chase@chasebrown.com.  Several hundred of my  
copyrighted pictures can be viewed at the following addresses. 
 
http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411.html 
http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,15.html 
http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,30.html 
http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,45.html 
http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,60.html 
http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,75.html 
http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,90.html 
http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,105.html

http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,120.html

http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,135.html

http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,150.html

http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,165.html

http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,180.html

http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,195.html

http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,210.html

http://www.famousboard.com/bailey-from-baileysroom-t16411,start,225.html

 
 
All of the pictures posted on that forum are owned by my company, CB  
Entertainment LLC and are in violation of my copyright.  As stated  
previously, I HAVE NOT authorized this content to be posted or  
distributed by anyone via that board. 
 
Under penalty of perjury I state that I am the copyright owner of the  
content in question and that this notice is accurate. 
 
A copy of this email has been sent to my attorney, Robert Apgood.  If  
proper measures are not taken to have that content removed and links to

my content removed legal action will be taken. 
 
Please let me know when this matter has been resolved. 
 
Thank You 
Chase Brown 
Axis-Adult.com
